name: Arcade Fishing 3D
description:
This is a classic arcade fishing 3D game, which can bring you a super cool visual experience. The game has classic levels, sea king competition, Neptune's fishery, hunting tournament, ranking tournament, points tournament and other rich and diverse gameplay, and you can get a lot of valuable props.

◆Diverse gameplay◆
Classic Levels】 Nearly 10 levels, each level can obtain different treasures!
Poseidon Tournament] Daily and weekly rewards based on ranking.
Challenge】 Regularly develop new seasons, each season has special turrets to get, such as Kung Fu Panda Turret, Gundam Turret, etc. You can also get rechargeable currency!
Hunting Competition】Daily/weekly/Monthly ranking to get items from the mall.
Season Pass】 Every season, a new pass will be introduced and you can get great rewards just by participating!

◆ Rich system ◆
Enhancement System】 You can use coins / sea souls and other props to enhance the turret multiplier and increase the damage of the turret.
Quest System】There are newbie quests/daily quests/growth quests/challenge quests, you can get more rewards by completing different quests.
Skill System】You can use multiple skills in the level, which greatly increases the profit of the level.
